programme.title: Don't Divorce Me! Kids' Rules for Parents on Divorce
programme.desc: Children talk about divorce and offer advice for parents to make sure kids are not manipulated, forgotten or mistreated when the time for permanent separation comes(n)

Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: Chris O'Neil and Rhiannon Leigh Wryn star as siblings Noah and Emma Wilder in Bob Shaye's intelligent family sci-fi adventure drama that doesn't talk down to children. While staying at their family beach house near Seattle, Noah and Emma find a box of things that look like toys, but prove to be far more mysterious. Sent back in time, the 'toys' are trying to pass on a message about the future. And the more Noah and Emma play with the objects from the box, the more their intelligence grows. But one day Noah lines up the toys and accidentally activates a powerful force that creates a state-wide blackout. With her family under arrest by the FBI, Emma must make sense of the messages Mimzy, the toy rabbit, has been telepathically communicating to her. Also starring Joely Richardson and Timothy Hutton(n)

programme.title: Max

programme.desc: Alice, a web designer has a whirlwind romance with Adam, a mountain climber, getting engaged very quickly. But as things progress Alice realises she knows very little about her new spouse

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars in this uplifting and whimsical fable about a Texas rancher and family man who builds a rocket in his barn to fulfill his dream of blasting into space. Virginia Madsen, Max Thieriot, Bruce Dern, Tim Blake Nelson. Directed by Michael Polish

The film stars Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, and is directed by Wes Ball

programme.title: Shakedown
programme.desc: A cop and a lawyer battle corruption and an outbreak of crack cocaine distribution

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Neglected by her adulterous husband and left feeling particularly vulnerable as her marriage crumbles, lonely teacher Claire (Jennifer Lopez) has an affair with a younger neighbor (Ryan Guzman) that turns terrifying as his fiery lust morphs into dangerous obsession. John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

But when Doug, a handsome stranger, crashes his motorcycle outside her store, Tilo tends to his wounds and her life is changed forever

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: In this action-packed, special effect-filled super production, horrifying legendary creatures challenge the brave monster hunter Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman, X-Men). It all starts when Count Dracula (Richard Roxburgh) decides to use Dr. Victor Frankenstein's invention to create a legion of vampires. In order to do so, he needs to absorb the energy only the Werewolf can generate. To stop the experiment, the Vatican sends Van Helsing to Transylvania. There, together with Anna Valerious (Kate Beckinsale, Pearl Harbor) - whose family has been fighting the forces of evil for decades - he will face the terrifying monsters. The film was directed by the talented Stephen Sommers (The Mummy, The Mummy Returns)

programme.title: Paper Towns

A hugely successful player in the financial world, he considers her to be his most treasured acquisition. But she needs more than the role of a dazzling accessory. Brilliant in her own right, she is involved with a struggling artist who fulfills her emotional needs. Her husband discovers her indiscretion and sets out to commit the perfect murder

programme.title: Say Anything

Cameron Crowe's comedy manages to break out of the teen-flick genre thanks to his direction and the three astute leads(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: The arrival of alien spacecraft heralds a mighty invasion, but the Earth fights back: a fighter pilot, a boffin and the US President team up to foil the intergalactic plan

programme.title: Naked Lunch
programme.desc: David Cronenberg's bizarre and disturbing drama is based on William Burroughs' equally strange novel, with some outrageous sequences involving William Lee, an ex-drug addict who now makes a living from exterminating cockroaches. programme.desc: The early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s. His career spanned everything from oil, for which he cared little, to movies, casinos, and aviation - as he turned millions of dollars into billions

Sin embargo, una intensa tormenta de nieve obliga a posponer el vuelo. Los más de 300 pasajeros deberán hospedarse en un hotel cercano, a la espera de que las circunstancias meteorológicas mejoren. Slastan convivirá un tiempo con ellos, conocerá sus vidas. ¿Vale la pena acabar con la vida de todos ellos, y con la suya propia? (cc)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: Como muchos otros inmigrantes irlandeses, Eilis llega a los Estados Unidos en la década de 1950 con mucha esperanza, pero también con lo suficiente que perder en esta aventura de encontrar trabajo y acomodarse lejos de su pueblo natal. Hallar el amor junto al joven italiano Tony y sentirse abrigada por una comunidad cristiana de Brooklyn, la hacen sentir en casa. Pero una noticia funesta desde Irlanda mutará prematuramente sus planes. (cc)

programme.title: Lucy

El cuerpo de Lucy responde de manera asombrosa: no siente dolor, es capaz de leer la mente de los demás, y su velocidad aumenta. La venganza contra aquellos que se aprovecharon de ella se convertirá ahora en su objetivo. (cc)

programme.title: The Crew
programme.desc: Mientras esperan ser echados de un hotel de Miami, cuantro mafiosos retirados tratan de asustar a los otros residentes haciéndoles una proposición que no pueden rechazar

programme.title: Back on Board Greg Louganis
programme.desc: Un documental del perfil del cuatro veces ganador de la medalla olímpica de oro en clavados y uno de los primeros atletas abiertamente gay de Estados Unidos. Se narran sus éxitos, la discriminación que ha enfrentado, sus luchas por la seguridad financiera y su regreso al deporte. (cc)

programme.title: Aurora
programme.desc: Sofía es una profesora de la localidad de Ventanas, una ciudad industrial en la costa de Chile. Está en el proceso de adopción de un niño cuando lee las noticias acerca de un bebé hallado muerto en un vertedero. La mujer se obsesiona con el destino de la niña muerta, que ella llama Aurora, pero que carece de derechos legales para tener un nombre y para ser enterrada. Sofía inicia una lucha contra la burocracia que se convierte en un viaje íntimo hacia la transformación personal. (cc)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. However, once in court, Crawford, representing himself, proceeds to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him. Can he possibly get away with his crime?(n)

programme.desc: Double bill. The team tries to improve the taste of Lars' favourite Norgish treats, but makes them worse. Then, Les runs a babysitting service, but finds Burt a tough challenge.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. When Randy runs out of smoke bombs, he must find a sacred tree whose sap is the key to making more. However, the problems is that it is McFist's Christmas tree.

programme.title: Wander Over Yonder
programme.desc: Double bill. A classic macho hero recruits Wander and Sylvia to join him on his quest to save a kidnapped princess. Then, Peepers gets Hater an arena full of death traps for his birthday.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy promises to have Spencer's back in a kung fu battle against Kleet. Then, Billy's ectoplasm brings a bubble gum bubble to life.

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer and Billy throw Rajeev a birthday party on Billy's private plane. Spencer lies to Billy in order to go to see a performer Billy despises.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double episode. Coop tries to call a Christmas ceasefire so he can enjoy a normal festive holiday with Dad, Millie and his grandparents, but Kat struggles to stick to the rules.

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Amazing Feet of Strength/Me Coop, You Kat.
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat enhances Coop's soccer shoes with alien technology so he can run faster and jump higher. Then, Kat uses his `devolution ray' to dumb Coop down.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Rorg: The Hero of a Past/Mort-al Combat.
programme.desc: Double bill. The inspiration for Viceroy's bot designs is revealed. Then, Howard's father Mort thinks Ninja is out to get him.

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Howard suddenly becomes evil and Randy tries to get him back to normal. Then, Randy's reaction to a fan opens him up to attack.

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster wants to be grown up, so acquires a sushi seaweed moustache - but it's poisonous. Then, Lola is out of work so Boyster's parents decide to move to the big city.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: The kings' overspending causes a tax to be levied on unhappy islanders. Soon Sirocco, a Robin Hood style outlaw, emerges. Boomer is amazed when he discovers Sirocco's identity.

programme.title: Pair of Kings
programme.desc: Brady finds a beautiful cave girl who has thawed after being frozen for hundreds of years. He suggests Boomer dates her, but there is trouble when Boom's girlfriend visits.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace wants to get the boys in trouble for playing jetpack volleyball, but when Jeremy joins in, she has to cover for them.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double bill. Candace takes the DVD from the traffic camera and shows it to her mother as proof of the boys' misdeeds. Plus, the boys decide to create the biggest ever bowling ball.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.sub-title: How to Make a Monster/Oil on Candace.
programme.desc: Double bill. Grandpa tells the boys about a distant relative who built a monster platypus. Then, the boys take a tour of the museum of contemporary art.

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels
programme.desc: Ezra, Sabine, Zeb and Chopper venture to an abandoned medical station to salvage supplies, but are interrupted by the arrival of Inquisitors.

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker meets one of his heroes, Iron Man, who gives him his own suit of armour. However, it remains to be seen whether he can survive for even a day in the life of Tony Stark.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys create a giant version of a game that Candace holds the record for playing.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Baljeet is about to compete in a bike race, but feels certain he will do badly. The boys recruit some special help to inspire him. Tour de France winner Greg LeMond guest stars.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Double-length episode. Ferb's British cousins come to visit and accuse him of having become too American - resulting in a football match between his family and friends.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: When Dipper tries to prove to a couple of government agents that paranormal activities occur in Gravity Falls, he accidentally raises the living dead.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: When Soos finds himself in need of a date for his cousin Reggie's engagement party, he looks to a dating simulator game to help him talk to girls.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys make themselves small enough to fit anywhere by using their shrinking machine, and Candace does the same when she shows it to Mum.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys try to help Baljeet impress a childhood girlfriend by taking the pair on a cruise, but when Doof's rocket hits the ship, they have to use a water slide to rescue everyone.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Baljeet enrols on a geology course, but discovers it is really about becoming a rock star.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Vanessa receives help from Ferb in obtaining a special substance for her father.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper finds an unlikely friend to join him with his newest obsession, a board game called Dungeons, Dungeons & More Dungeons.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: When Grunkle Stan decides to run for mayor, Dipper and Mabel have their work cut out for them trying to turn their gaffe-prone uncle into the perfect candidate.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Grunkle Stan goes on a road-trip to sabotage all the other tourist traps in Oregon. Meanwhile, Dipper tries flirt with girls on the open road.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: A new threat requires that Mabel venture into the enchanted realm of the unicorns. Meanwhile, Dipper learns an unexpected twist about the enigmatic Bill Cipher.

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.sub-title: Lab Rats: Bionic Island: Ultimate Tailgate Challenge.
programme.desc: When Tasha gets everyone except Perry tickets to the big game, Perry is upset and accidentally destroys the tickets. In response a competition between Perry and the Davenports is arranged to win the Ultimate Tailgate Challenge and secure new tickets.

programme.title: Lab Rats
programme.sub-title: Lab Rats: Bionic Island: Space Elevator.
programme.desc: Davenport's top scientist Dr. Ryan arrives to test his latest advance in space technology. Chase feels threatened and the rivalry heats up when he must work as Ryan's assistant.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel realises she is slightly taller than Dipper, and when everyone begins to tease him about it, he heads into the forest to find height-altering crystals.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: The people of Gravity Falls celebrate Halloween in the summer, and Dipper enrages a monster who threatens to eat him if he does not collect enough sweets while trick or treating.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace teases the boys about the Lake Nose Monster, but becomes scared when she imagines seeing it while on lifeguard duty. When they finally meet the creature, they find it to be gentle and kind.

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: The superhero and his team have to fight for their lives in Aunt May's house when SHIELD's security system turns into a death trap.

programme.title: Ultimate Spider-Man
programme.desc: Spidey and his team travel to the moon to save the son of Spidey's greatest critic, J Jonah Jameson. But a bizarre threat awaits them on the lunar surface.

programme.title: Star Wars: The New Yoda Chronicles
programme.desc: Luke finds himself in a race against time to find the Jedi Holocrons, which are buried on Tatooine, after he realises Darth Vader is also looking for them.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Mabel learns her favourite boy band are being held prisoner and sets them free - but decides it might be more fun to keep them captive herself.

programme.title: Gravity Falls
programme.desc: Dipper and Mabel do not want to share a room any more, but their search for a second bedroom leads to an encounter with a carpet that has the power to switch people's bodies.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: Candace finds a strange device in the yard and shows it to Mum, but it turns out not to belong to the boys.

programme.title: Star vs the Forces of Evil

programme.title: Pickle and Peanut
programme.desc: When Pickle and Peanut accidentally get the sweet elderly Mam Mams arrested, they have to break her out of gramma jail before inmate Psycho Cyclops can get to her.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: When Mom runs out of Doonkleberries for her famous Doonkleberry pie, the boys rush out to find some for her.

programme.title: Marvel Avengers Assemble

programme.title: Star Wars Rebels

programme.title: Gamers Guide to Pretty Much Everything
programme.desc: In an attempt to win Pranktube's annual best prank vid contest, Connor and Ashley pull a prank on Franklin to make him think he rode over a waterfall in a barrel.

programme.title: Gamers Guide to Pretty Much Everything
programme.desc: The gang hears about a zombie video game, Zomb-pocalypse, that was withdrawn from sale for being `Too Scary for Anyone', so Conor tries to get his hands on a copy.
